mapper.insert:
REPLACE INTO irs_approval_file (approval_date, approval_doc_id, approval_itemid, approval_number, approval_title, file_path, validity_date, validity_flag) VALUE
(#{item.approvalDate},#{item.approvalDocId},#{item.approvalItemid},#{item.approvalNumber},#{item.approvalTitle}, #{item.filePath},#{item.validityDate},#{item.validityFlag})
